revised_title: Mitochondrial Phylogeography of Rock-Dwelling Cichlid Fishes in Lake Tanganyika
tldr: The study investigates the mitochondrial DNA control region of rock-dwelling cichlid fishes in Lake Tanganyika, revealing a high degree of genetic variation and endemism among populations. The research suggests that major fluctuations in lake levels have played a significant role in shaping the adaptive radiation and speciation of these cichlid fishes.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
